Method.name: TestLocal
Method.Implementation: #dim connection As %Net.RemoteConnection = ##class(%Net.RemoteConnection).%New() #dim status As %Status = connection.Connect("127.0.0.1",$zu(5),^%SYS("SSPort"),"_SYSTEM","SYS") set status = connection.ResetArguments() set status = connection.AddArgument("Hello", 0 /*by ref*/, $$$cbindStringId) #dim rVal As %String = "" set status = connection.InvokeClassMethod(..%ClassName(1), "TestMethod", .rVal, 1 /*has return*/, $$$cbindStringId) zw rVal do connection.Disconnect()

Method.name: TestRemote
Method.Implementation: #dim connection As %Net.RemoteConnection = ##class(%Net.RemoteConnection).%New() #dim status As %Status = connection.Connect("127.0.0.1","RMAPREDUCE",1972,"_SYSTEM","SYS") set status = connection.ResetArguments() set status = connection.AddArgument("Hello", 0 /*by ref*/, $$$cbindStringId) #dim rVal As %String = "" set status = connection.InvokeClassMethod(..%ClassName(1), "TestMethod", .rVal, 1 /*has return*/, $$$cbindStringId) zw rVal do connection.Disconnect()
